short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for the Belgium eID card

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The eID Chrome Extension gives access to the eID card within the Chrome web browser. The eID Chrome solution has been integrated within our eID Identity Provider and Digital Signature Service.
